Thanks nic, I appreciate it

 --- Nicolas Marion <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:

---------------------------------
Let me check this out; I'll react after I've seen the
damages. However, I 
will react.


>From: Polar Claw <cycodrone@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: OOC: Nic
>Date: Wed, 4 Feb 2004 20:15:34 +1100 (EST)
>
>Nic, I think the flood posting thing has gotten
beyond
>the point of discussion, with the current modding
>going on (at the risk of pointing fingers, airly and
>shadowess agoth are by far the worst offenders at
>this), how the heck am I meant to get a fair chance
to
>reply to posts. I think you need to set a ruling in
>stone on this because it's clear that discussion is
>pointless with the nothing coming of it. I think a
>rule needs to be set that if a player is not given a
>fair chance to reply, then any posts beyond the point
>of a realistic reply (as in anything that would
exceed
>time periods where characters reply if the situation
>were real) be declared VOID. Because I currently
don't
>see how I can continue in this RPG when I'm not given
>a fair chance to reply.
>
